code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from"react";import gsap from"gsap";import{personalDetails}from"../Details";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const{name,tagline,img}=personalDetails;const h11=useRef();const h12=useRef();const h13=useRef();const myimageref=useRef();useEffect(()=>{const tl=gsap.timeline();tl.from(h11.current,{x:"-100%",delay:0.8,opacity:0,duration:2,ease:"Power3.easeOut"},"<").from(h12.current,{x:"-100%",delay:0.5,opacity:0,duration:2,ease:"Power3.easeOut"},"<").from(h13.current,{x:"-100%",delay:0.1,opacity:0,duration:2,ease:"Power3.easeOut"},"<").from(myimageref.current,{x:"200%",delay:0.5,opacity:0,duration:2,ease:"Power3.easeOut"},"<");},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"container mx-auto max-width section md:flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{ref:h11,className:"text-2xl text-dark-heading dark:text-light-heading md:text-4xl xl:text-5xl xl:leading-tight font-bold",children:["Hi,\uD83D\uDC4B",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"My Name is",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{ref:h12,className:"text-2xl bg-clip-text bg-gradient text-transparent md:text-4xl xl:text-5xl xl:leading-tight font-bold",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{ref:h13,className:"text-2xl text-dark-heading dark:text-light-heading md:text-4xl xl:text-5xl xl:leading-tight font-bold",children:tagline})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-5 md:mt-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{ref:myimageref,className:"w-1/2 md:ml-auto",src:img,alt:"Pavan MG"})})]});}export default Home;
